section.p: The ship slams into you and the pirates come swarming across the rail like army ants. Your crewmen stand ready to sell their lives dearly.

Roll three dice
if you are a Warrior,
or
two dice
if you belong to any other profession.
Add your Rank to this roll. Then, if your crew is poor quality, subtract 2 from the total. If the crew is good, add 2. If the crew is excellent, add 3.

outcomes.outcome: Forced to give in; lose 1-6 Stamina
